title: The Elder Scrolls II: Daggerfall
description:
This is the official free download from Bethesda [url=http://bethblog.com/index.php/2009/07/09/daggerfall-now-available-for-free/]released on 2009-07-09[/url] to celebrate the 15th aniversary of The Elder Scrolls.

I'm uploading this as a torrent because the [url=http://www.elderscrolls.com/downloads/downloads_games.htm]official website's download[/url] is currently overloaded and they didn't think to use BitTorrent themselves.

You can also [url=http://www.fileshack.com/file.x/14752/The+Elder+Scrolls+II:+Daggerfall+Free+Client]get this at FileShack[/url], but you need to register there to download.

You will more than likely need to use [url=http://www.dosbox.com/]DOSBox[/url] to run the game, as it will not natively run on Windows. DOSBox also runs on Linux, Mac OS X, and other OSes.

Included is the [url=http://static.bethsoft.com/downloads/games/daggerfall_legal_and_installation.pdf]installation walkthrough[/url] that they posted on their blog. It's somewhat convoluted, and I suggest that you just learn to use DOSBox yourself.
